wikipedia_page.main: Terry Baddoo is a television executive and a former TV host. He is half-English and half-Ghanaian, and lives in the USA.

response: *Terry Baddoo, journalist and television news presenter

Shortly before Craven's departure, the show was renamed Newsround, and was then presented by a rotating team including Juliet Morris, Krishnan Guru-Murthy, Julie Etchingham, Chris Rogers, Kate Gerbeau, Matthew Price and Becky Jago. Regular reporters on the programme, who have also presented it, included Paul Welsh, Lizo Mzimba and Terry Baddoo.
* Terry Baddoo (previously with CNN)  — Game Time London
